situation.title: COVID III guarantee program for companies affected by coronavirus (from the Czech-Moravian Guarantee and Development Bank)
situation.meta_description: Support by a guarantee for the operating bank loans of entrepreneurs up to 500 employees.

content.processed:
The program is intended for self-employed persons and companies with up to 500 employees, whose economic activities are limited due to the occurrence of coronavirus infection and related preventive measures. The program supports fast lending for operating and now also for the investment costs of companies through commercial banks. The guarantor is the Czech-Moravian Guarantee and Development Bank (ČMZRB). The state then provides a guarantee for its debts arising from this guarantee.

Purpose / conditions: To cover operating expenses such as wages, rent, energy payments, payment of supplier-customer invoices, acquisition of supplies, materials, etc. The provision of guarantees to entrepreneurs from the COVID III program will be extended until at least mid-2021. It will be possible to apply for guarantees up to 6 years from the date of the loan agreement.

What is the maximum amount of support: The support is provided in the form of ČMZRB's guarantee to the cooperating bank for the portfolio of transactions of final beneficiaries.

The transaction must meet the following conditions:

(a) enterprises with up to 250 employees

- up to 90% of the principal of the guaranteed loan, but not more than  45 million CZK

- duration of liability: maximum 3 years

(b) enterprises with 250 to 500 employees

- up to 80% of the principal of the guaranteed loan, but not more than  40 million CZK

- duration of liability: maximum 3 years

The maximum amount of the guaranteed loan may not exceed 50 million CZK. The agreed loan maturity may not occur before 1 January 2021, with the exception of loans agreed for an indefinite period.

Method of submitting the application: Filling in the contact form (only on czech, please use the google translate extension to fill in the form)

You can find a list of supported activities here.

The loan is decided by the cooperating commercial bank that receives the application. Unlike in the COVID I and II programs, ČMZRB will not be entering into the approval process, which will speed up the process of applications.

More information here.

If you have an acute legal problem, you can contact the free telephone consultation on this website.
